Posts.Content: Lita wrote: I already have one lump and they were set to do a lumpectomy this Friday.  Now the MRI is showing another lump.  I have to get a MRI biopsy.  Wondering if I should take a valium because it's a 2 hour long process.  It's disconcerting that I have another one. Where else is the cancer?  Anyone have 2 lumps on each breast?  I feel like I'm going to get disfigured completely. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: They found another lump during MRI Lita wishiwere

Posts.Content: Oct 14, 2008 09:26PM Lita wrote: Thanks for all the responses.  My doc changed her mind and decided I should try to have another ultrasound biopsy first before trying the MRI Biopsy.  So I went in for that one, and they were successful and gathering some tissue.  So here's hoping it's not another one....
Posts.Title: They found another lump during MRI Lita wishiwere
